directions: Stir wine, sugar, lemon juice, brandy, lemon peel and nutmeg in medium bowl. Let mixture stand at room temperature to allow flavors to blend, stirring occasionally, about 2 hours. (Can be made 1 day ahead. Cover and refrigerate.)
Beat cream in large bowl until very stiff peaks form. Gently fold in wine mixture, 2 tablespoons at a time. Spoon syllabub into 4 coupes or wineglasses. (Can be made 1 day ahead. Cover; and chilled.)
Garnish with fresh raspberries, if desired, and serve.
ingredients: 6 tablespoons sweet dessert wine (such as late-harvest Riesling)
title: Sweet Wine Syllabub
